start_onboarding_1:
üëã Welcome to Matplobbot!

I'm here to help you with programming libraries, LaTeX, and more. Let's take a quick tour of my features.
start_onboarding_2:
üìö First, you can browse and search your personal collection of notes from GitHub repositories.

Let's add your first repository to get started!
start_onboarding_3:
Great! Now you can use `/lec_all` to browse it or `/lec_search` to find content inside it.

Next up: I have a built-in library of code examples from `matplobblib`.
start_onboarding_4: You can also render complex math formulas with LaTeX or create diagrams with Mermaid.js right here in the chat.
start_onboarding_schedule: üìÖ I can also work with the university schedule! You can search for schedules for groups, teachers, and auditoriums, and subscribe to daily notifications.
start_onboarding_5:
That's it! You're all set.

All these features and more are available from the main menu. Feel free to explore!
help_intro:
This is a bot for finding code examples from the matplobblib library.

Click a button to execute a command:
settings_restart_onboarding_confirm: Are you sure you want to restart the tour? This will reset your current context.
settings_delete_my_data_confirm:
‚ö†Ô∏è **DANGER ZONE** ‚ö†Ô∏è

Are you absolutely sure you want to delete all of your data? This action is irreversible and will remove:

- Your settings
- Your saved favorites
- Your linked GitHub repositories
- Your schedule subscriptions
- Your action history

After deletion, the bot will treat you as a new user.
repo_add_already_exists: ‚ö†Ô∏è Repository `{repo_path}` is already in your list.
repo_add_invalid_format: ‚ùå Invalid format. Please use the `owner/repository` format.
repo_edit_prompt: Send the new name for repository `{old_repo_path}` (in `owner/repo` format):
latex_prompt: Please send your formula in LaTeX syntax (outer `$...` are optional):
latex_render_error:
Could not render the formula.

**Error:**
```
{error}
```

Please ensure the syntax is correct.
mermaid_prompt: Please send your diagram code in Mermaid syntax:
matp_all_show_error: Error: code information is outdated. Please start over with /matp_all.
github_download_error: Failed to download or send file `{file_name}`. Error: {error}
github_fetch_exception: An error occurred while loading the file: {error}
github_pdf_error: An error occurred while creating the PDF file: {error}. Sending as plain text.
github_html_error: An error occurred while creating the HTML file: {error}. Sending as plain text.
github_repo_content_error: Could not get repository contents. There might be an issue with the GitHub token or API.
favorites_empty: You don't have any favorite examples yet. You can add them by clicking the '‚≠ê Add to Favorites' button under a code example.
favorites_info_outdated: Error: Favorite item information is outdated. Please use /favorites again.
search_prompt_library: Enter keywords to search for code examples:
search_no_results:
No results found for your query '{query}'.
Try different keywords or use /matp_all to browse.
search_results_outdated: Search results are outdated. Please perform the search again.
search_invalid_result: Invalid search result. It might be outdated.
github_no_repos_configured: You have no repositories configured for browsing. Please add them in /settings.
github_file_info_outdated: Error: File information is outdated. Please refresh the navigation.
github_search_prompt: Enter a query to search in repository `{repo_path}`:
github_choose_repo_search: Select a repository to search in:
github_search_error: An error occurred during the search. Please try again later.
github_search_no_results: Nothing was found for your query '{query}'.
github_search_results_found:
Found {count} files in `{repo_path}` for query '{query}'.
Page {page}/{total_pages}:
help_menu_header:
This is a bot for finding code examples from the matplobblib library.

Click a button to execute a command:
help_already_in_menu: You are already in the help menu.
show_code_error: Could not find or display this code example. It may have been deleted or moved.
admin_no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
admin_update_finished: Update complete. Choose the next command:
admin_clear_cache_success: ‚úÖ All application cache has been successfully cleared.
admin_clear_cache_finished: Cache clearing complete. Choose the next command:
schedule_welcome: Welcome to the schedule section! What would you like to search for?
schedule_search_started: I've started your search. I'll send the results as a new message when they're ready.
schedule_prompt_for_query_person: Please enter the teacher's last name:
schedule_no_results: No results found for your query '{query}'.
schedule_api_error: An error occurred while contacting the university API. Please try again later.
schedule_api_timeout_error: The university's server is taking too long to respond. Please try a more specific query or try again in a moment.
schedule_no_lessons_today: There are no lessons scheduled for this day.
schedule_select_date: Please select a date to view the schedule:
schedule_no_lessons_day: No lessons scheduled for the selected day.
schedule_no_lessons_week: No lessons scheduled for the selected week.
calendar_already_on_today: You are already viewing the current month.
schedule_export_ical_error: An error occurred while generating the iCal file. Please try again.
schedule_prompt_for_time:
Great! Now, enter the time you want to receive the schedule notification for the next day.

Please use `HH:MM` format (e.g., `07:00` or `21:30`).
schedule_invalid_time_format: ‚ùå Invalid time format. Please use `HH:MM`, for example, `08:00`.
schedule_invalid_time_value: ‚ùå Invalid time value. Please enter a correct time, for example, `08:00`.
schedule_subscribe_success: ‚úÖ You have successfully subscribed to the daily schedule for '{entity_name}' at {time_str}!
schedule_subscribe_error: An error occurred while creating the subscription. Please try again.
schedule_subscribe_dberror: An error occurred while saving the subscription to the database.
subscriptions_empty: You have no active schedule subscriptions.
subscription_info_outdated: Error: Subscription info is outdated. Please go back to settings and try again.
subscription_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the subscription for '{entity_name}'?
subscription_removed_by_admin_notificati: ‚ÑπÔ∏è The schedule subscription for '{entity_name}' was removed by administrator {admin_name}.
subscription_change_time_prompt: Please enter the new time you want to receive notifications in `HH:MM` format (e.g., `08:30` or `22:00`).
subscription_time_updated: ‚úÖ Notification time for '{entity_name}' has been updated to {time_str}.
myschedule_no_subscriptions: You have no active subscriptions. You can add them via the /schedule command.
schedule_change_notification: ‚ùóÔ∏è Attention! The schedule for '{entity_name}' has been updated.
group_chat_start_text: Hello! I'm Matplobbot. To access all my features, please start a conversation with me in a private message.
shorter_name_prompt_full: Please send the full, official name of the discipline as it appears in the schedule.
shorter_name_prompt_short: Now, please send your suggested shorter name for this discipline.
shorter_name_suggestion_sent: Thank you! Your suggestion has been sent to the administrator for review.
shorter_name_suggestion_approved: ‚úÖ Your suggestion for the short name '{short_name}' has been approved!
shorter_name_suggestion_declined: Unfortunately, your suggestion for a shorter name was declined.
shorter_name_suggestion_duplicate: This suggestion has already been submitted and is pending review. Thank you!
shorter_name_limit_exceeded: You have reached your suggestion limit for today. Please try again tomorrow.
admin_settings_summary_time_prompt: Enter the time to receive the daily admin summary (HH:MM).
admin_daily_summary_text:
üìä **Daily Bot Summary**

- New Users Today: `{new_users}`
- Total Actions Today: `{total_actions}`
- New Schedule Subscriptions: `{new_subscriptions}`
- Shorter Name Suggestions: `{new_suggestions}`
subscription_time_conflict_error: The chosen time is already taken for this subscription. Please choose a different time.
subscription_update_failed_general: Failed to update subscription time due to an internal error. Please try again later.
delete_my_data_success: All your personal data has been successfully deleted. Thank you for using the bot. You can start over with the /start command.
delete_my_data_error: Could not delete your data due to an internal error. Please contact the administrator.
short_names_list_empty: No short names have been approved yet.
short_name_deleted_success: Short name mapping has been deleted.
